Room.Name: Jungle Quicksand
Room.ShortDescription: You have blundered into a pool of quicksand and you are gradually sinking.
Room.LongDescription: The quicksand has the appearance of solid ground, but as you slowly sink you realize there is probably no bottom. Unfortunately, you are too far from the banks to grasp any of the branches hanging over the area. If you don't do something quickly, you may slide under the surface and die.
